languages.text: Сестра битвы испросила разрешения помолиться у великой святыни — Торгового Патента.
The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.
languages.original_text: Сестра битвы испросила разрешения помолиться у великой святыни — Торгового Патента.

traits.locale_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray by the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.

languages.text: La Sœur de Bataille a demandé la permission de prier devant l'éminente relique qu'est la lettre de marque.
languages.original_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.

traits.locale_text: La Sœur de Bataille a demandé la permission de prier devant l'éminente relique qu'est la lettre de marque.

languages.text: Die Schwester der Schlacht hat um Erlaubnis gebeten, vor dem großen Relikt zu beten — vor dem Handelsbrief.
languages.original_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.

traits.locale_text: Die Schwester der Schlacht hat um Erlaubnis gebeten, vor dem großen Relikt zu beten — vor dem Handelsbrief.

languages.text: La Hermana de Batalla ha solicitado permiso para rezar ante la gran reliquia, la Patente de Comercio.
languages.original_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.

traits.locale_text: La Hermana de Batalla ha solicitado permiso para rezar ante la gran reliquia, la Patente de Comercio.

languages.text: バトルシスターは、通商許可証という大いなる遺物を前に祈る許しを欲しいと願い出た。
languages.original_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.

traits.locale_text: バトルシスターは、通商許可証という大いなる遺物を前に祈る許しを欲しいと願い出た。

languages.text: 战斗修女向你提出了请求，希望你允许她在伟大的贸易授状前进行祈祷。
languages.original_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.

traits.locale_text: 战斗修女向你提出了请求，希望你允许她在伟大的贸易授状前进行祈祷。

languages.text: Harp Rahibesi, yüce Ticari Ruhsatname yadigârının önünde dua etmek için izin istedi.
languages.original_text: The Sister of Battle has requested permission to pray before the great relic that is the Warrant of Trade.
